fields.title: Kimi no Nawa
fields.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way.
fields.review: A good anime film that has a message, interesting characters, and authenticity.

fields.title: Howl's Moving Castle
fields.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch.
fields.review: Yet another wonderful movie from Hayao Miyazaki

fields.title: Frozen
fields.description: Princess Anna teams up with Kristoff and Sven and sets off on a journey to find her sister Elsa
fields.review: Very eye soothing scenes are in

fields.title: Frozen 2
fields.description: Three years after the events of the first film, Frozen (2013)

fields.title: Pengabdi Setan
fields.description: After dying from a strange illness, a mother returns home to pick up her children.
fields.review: The ideas they had at some parts were really good

fields.title: Pengabdi Setan 2
fields.description: After moving from their home to an apartment building, a new terror awaits.

fields.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
fields.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help.
fields.review: It has comedy, action, and exciting story

fields.title: Joker
fields.description: A mentally troubled stand-up comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.
fields.review: This is a movie that only those who have felt alone and isolated can truly relate to it.

fields.title: Midsommar
fields.description: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival.
fields.review: This movie was a trip, and terrifying on its on way.

fields.title: Death on the Nile
fields.description: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.
fields.review: Developing of the characters isn't very well but cinematography and direction is spectacular

fields.title: Knives Out
fields.description: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
fields.review: Found myself really enjoying the movie
